associations: The Garage Door Controller supports one Association group: the “Lifeline” group which can have one node in the group.

paramInformation.label: Door Open Timeout
paramInformation.description: Seconds allowed for garage door to open until timeout.

paramInformation.label: Door Close Timeout
paramInformation.description: Seconds allowed for garage door to close until timeout.

paramInformation.label: Accelerometer Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: 1 is least sensitive, 100 is most sensitive.

paramInformation.label: Application-Level Retries
paramInformation.description: Number of attempts on top of the stack-level retries to try to reach the controller/hub with Z-Wave messages.

metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions of the Z-Wave controller to put the Z-Wave controller into manual or classic Z-Wave inclusion mode.
2. Locate and press the hub button on the device.
3. When it is successfully added, the device will beep and blink green once.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the Z-Wave controller's instructions on putting the Z-Wave controller into removal/exclusion mode.
2. Locate and press the hub button.
3. Device's status indicator will blink red and beep three times to indicate successful removal
metadata.reset:
Hold the reset button down for ten seconds. The status indicator will blink red while the reset button is pressed and will go out after ten seconds.
The device's status indicator will turn green when the reset operation is complete.
